name: headingLevel
description: The heading level which represents an element from `<h1>` through to `<h6>`.

name: headingSize
description: The physical size of the sidebar title (`xl`, `l`, `m` or `s`).

params.name: text
params.description: The text of the sidebar item.

params.name: href
params.description: The URL of the sidebar item.

params.name: current
params.description: If `true`, highlight the item as the current page or section.

params.name: children
params.description: A list of sidebar child items.

params.name: text
params.description: The text of the child sidebar item.

params.name: href
params.description: The URL of the child sidebar item.

name: type
description: The type of sidebar style to use. Can be `contents`, `sections` or  `pages`.

name: sticky
description: If `true`, allows the sidebar to 'stick' to the top of the screen when scrolling.

name: classes
description: Classes to add to the sidebar.

name: attributes
description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the sidebar.
